description: An add-on which aims to enhance the experience while using Zoom and NVDA
changelog:
* Changed messages reported when toggling Zoom alerts reporting settings in custom alerts reporting mode.
* NVDA will no longer announce public and private chats if alerts for these are disabled from the add-on settings.
* NVDA will once again show public and private chat messages in the chat history list.
